mapper.delete: DELETE FROM BOARD /* com.board.BoardDao.deleteContent */ WHERE SEQ=#{seq}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* com.board.BoardDao.insertContent */ BOARD (TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER) VALUES (#{title} ,#{content} ,#{writer})
mapper.select: SELECT /* com.board.BoardDao.view */ SEQ , TITLE , CONTENT , DATE_FORMAT(CREATED, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATED , WRITER , HIT FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1 AND SEQ=#{seq}
SELECT /* com.board.BoardDao.totalCount */ COUNT(*) AS TOTCOUNT FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1

SELECT /* com.board.BoardDao.pagingList */ * FROM (SELECT ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY SEQ DESC) AS RNUM, A.* FROM (SELECT SEQ , TITLE , CONTENT , DATE_FORMAT(CREATED, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATED , WRITER , HIT FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1 ) A WHERE 1=1 ) B WHERE 1=1 AND RNUM BETWEEN #{listNumStart} AND #{listNumEnd}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO /* com.board.BoardDao.data */ BOARD (TITLE, CONTENT, WRITER) VALUES (#{TITLE}, #{CONTENT}, #{WRITER})
mapper.select: SELECT /* com.board.BoardDao.list */ SEQ , TITLE , WRITER , DATE_FORMAT(CREATED, '%y-%m-%d %H:%i') AS CREATED , HIT FROM BOARD WHERE 1=1 ORDER BY SEQ DESC
SELECT /* com.board.BoardDao.sample */ * FROM BOARD ORDER BY SEQ DESC
